content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Maria. I understand that you're interested in renting it for the highest price possible. May I ask what your budget is for renting an apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1000 Euros

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

The apartment is 25 square meters.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I see, Maria. Thank you for sharing your budget. I understand that you're looking for the lowest possible rental price. As a landlord, I want to maximize my gains and therefore would like to negotiate with you regarding the rental price.

Based on the information you've provided, I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim. I believe this is a fair price that would allow both of us to benefit.

What are your thoughts on this proposed rental price, Maria?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros, please give me the contract to sign.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Great, Maria. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. I will prepare the contract for you to sign, and we can schedule a time for you to move in.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm happy to help in any way I can.

Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to working with you as your landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
